snippet: Johnny Damon, who was released by Cleveland in August and is 231 hits short of 3,000 for his career, will try to help Thailand qualify for the 2013 World Baseball Classic.
abstract: MLB outfielder Johnny Damon, released by Cleveland Indians in August and unsigned for 2013, will try to help Thailand qualify for the 2013 World Baseball Classic.
lead_paragraph: Johnny Damon, who was released by Cleveland in August and is 231 hits short of 3,000 for his career, will try to help Thailand qualify for the 2013 World Baseball Classic.

headline.seo: Johnny Damon Playing for Thailand in World Baseball Classic Qualifying
headline.main: Damon Takes an International Step to a Possible Last Hurrah
headline.print_headline: Unsigned for 2013, Damon Takes an International Step to a Possible Last Hurrah
